attributes.additional_details:
As an example in 2015 ukip had recieved in excess of  8 million votes yet only had 1 Mp in a seat in the house of commons  .
The current system is not fit for purpose , it is corrupt it is out of date , it is a way of keeping the 2 so called main parties of  conservative & labour in power . 

Please sign this petition and make every vote matter . 
It is time the people of this country had a voice ....
attributes.background:
The current voting system of first past the post  is not democratic and is unfair . 
It is time for this country to have a fair voting system for ALL . 
The current system is corrupt .
We need an alternative voting system , Which is more democratic.
 
It is time the people had a voice ..

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what voting system you'd like to be used for UK elections. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
